field.label: Research Interests
field.value: My work concentrates on the legal, ethical and policy dimensions of health research and clinical care, with a special focus on biobanking, data sharing, professional liability, and the use of novel technologies (e.g. mhealth apps, WGS, WES) in both the clinical and research settings.

bilingual.english: My work concentrates on the legal, ethical and policy dimensions of health research and clinical care, with a special focus on biobanking, data sharing, professional liability, and the use of novel technologies (e.g. mhealth apps, WGS, WES) in both the clinical and research settings.

field.label: Department
field.value: Centre de recherche en droit public (CRDP)

field.label: Work Description
field.value:
Research interests:
Civil and professional liability of health professionals in research
Legal and ethical implications of Population Genetics
Analysis of the legal and ethical aspects of biotechnological projects (e.g. biobanks, pediatric genomic research, point-of-care diagnostic devices)
Substantive contribution to the drafting of research grant proposals to national and provincial funding agencies;Coordination of the HumGen International Database Project: www.humgen.org
Coordination of the PopGen (Population Genetics) Module:www.popgen.info

bilingual.english:
Research interests:
Civil and professional liability of health professionals in research
Legal and ethical implications of Population Genetics
Analysis of the legal and ethical aspects of biotechnological projects (e.g. biobanks, pediatric genomic research, point-of-care diagnostic devices)
Substantive contribution to the drafting of research grant proposals to national and provincial funding agencies;Coordination of the HumGen International Database Project: www.humgen.org
Coordination of the PopGen (Population Genetics) Module:www.popgen.info
